_header: These ladies fair that makes repair
Subjects: satire; women, lack of discretion; women, satire directed against; women, faithlessness of
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Of the ladyis solistaris at court’ — six twelve-line tail-rhyme stanzas

CULLl510.First Lines:
Thir ladyis fair þat makis repairAnd in þe court ar
                    kend…

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Thir ladeis fair That maks repairAnd in þe courte ar
                    kend…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…Sic can devyis and none SupprysThame throw þair
                    honeste
CamMagPep2553.Note: Portions written two lines of verse per line of MS.

Banna.First Lines:
Thir ladyis fair That makis repairand in the court ar
                    kend…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Swa can devyissand not suppryissthame nor thair
                    honestie
